t: Check out this Amazon review of Nova Maple Syrup - Pure Grade-A Maple Syrup (Gallon)
s: We have been buying real maple syrup for years now. And up to now, Canadian syrups have been our preference. Then we purchased this gallon of the Nova brand. We are converted. This syrup is dark, thick, and very tasty.
